Description: The method has 5 parameters. Parameters: s' t' width' x' y

The following statement contains a magic number: for (int i=0; i < s.Length; ++i)  			{  				double tt = (t + (s.Length-i-1)*0.1)*2;  				double lt = ((tt > 1) ? 1 : tt);  				double dy = Math.Sin(lt * Math.PI)/5;  				FOutputChar.Add(s[i].ToString());  				FOutputLocalTime.Add(t);  				FOutputXY.Add(x + width*i); //x  				FOutputXY.Add(y + dy); //y  			}
